references.author: Ang, S.L.
references.title: The formation and maintenance of the definitive endoderm lineage in the mouse: Involvement of HNF-3/fork head proteins

references.author: Arceci, R.J.
references.title: Mouse GATA-4: A retinoic acid-inducible GATA-binding transcription factor expressed in endodermally derived tissues and heart

references.author: Barnes, J.D.
references.title: Embryonic expression of Lim-1, the mouse homolog of Xenopus Xlim-1, suggests a role in lateral mesoderm differentiation and neurogenesis

experimental_methods: stably transfected P19 embryonic carcinoma cells that express antisense GATA4 transcripts
injection of GATA4, GATA5, or GATA6 RNA into Xenopus embryos
electroporation of AB2.2 ES cells with the linearized targeting vector
growth of ES cells on STO feeder fibroblasts for G418, and FIAU resistance
Cell cloning and isolation of genomic DNA for Southern analysis
reagents_chemicals: Moloney murine leukemia virus (Mo-MLV) reverse transcriptase
